title: Container - Usage Examples (Enhanced)
description: Comprehensive usage patterns with visual descriptions, validation rules, and warnings for pixel-perfect layouts

examples.name: Simple Content Section
examples.description: Basic centered content container for standard page sections
examples.visualDescription: 1200px wide centered container, 400px minimum height, 80px top/bottom padding, 20px side padding. White background, standard spacing.
examples.useCase: About sections, content areas, standard page sections
examples.responsiveNotes: Container becomes 100% width on small screens (sm), padding reduces for mobile

examples.name: Full-Width Hero Section with Gradient
examples.description: Edge-to-edge hero section with purple gradient background and wave shape divider
examples.visualDescription: Full viewport width, 600px minimum height, purple-to-violet gradient (135deg from #667eea to #764ba2), white wave shape divider at bottom (100px height). Content vertically centered.
examples.useCase: Hero sections, landing page headers, featured content areas
examples.responsiveNotes: Hero height reduces on tablets (450px) and mobile (400px). Shape divider height scales down on smaller screens.
examples.visualTips: Wave shape creates smooth transition to next section. Gradient provides visual interest without images.

examples.name: Card Grid Layout Container
examples.description: Wide container setup for displaying grid of cards or columns
examples.visualDescription: 1140px wide centered container, flexbox layout with row wrap, 30px gap between items. Minimum 300px height, light gray background (#f8f9fa).
examples.useCase: Card grids, feature sections, portfolio layouts, service listings
examples.responsiveNotes: Gutter space reduces on smaller screens (30px → 20px → 15px). Container becomes fluid width on tablets.
examples.layoutNotes: Use with 3-4 tp-container-inner blocks for optimal card grid. Gutter space applies as padding to inner columns.

examples.name: Video Background Hero (Pro)
examples.description: Full-width container with YouTube video background and overlay
examples.visualDescription: Full viewport width, 700px minimum height, YouTube video playing in background (looped, muted). Dark semi-transparent overlay (rgba(0,0,0,0.5)) for content readability. Fallback poster image shown until video loads.
examples.useCase: Premium hero sections, product showcases, immersive landing pages
examples.responsiveNotes: Video background disabled on mobile for performance. Poster image shown instead.
examples.performanceNotes: Always provide poster image (videoImg) for loading state. Mute video (videoMute: true) for autoplay to work.
warnings: Video backgrounds can impact page load performance - use sparingly
Always set videoMute: true for autoplay to work (browser policy)
Provide high-quality poster image for loading state and mobile fallback
Test video playback across browsers - some may block autoplay

examples.name: Sticky Navigation Container (Pro)
examples.description: Container that sticks to top of viewport when scrolling with smooth animation
examples.visualDescription: Initially normal flow, becomes fixed at top when scrolling past 100px offset. White background with subtle shadow appears on scroll. Slides in from top with 0.5s transition.
examples.useCase: Sticky headers, floating navigation bars, persistent CTAs
examples.responsiveNotes: Sticky behavior disabled on small screens (sm) to avoid viewport issues
examples.behaviorNotes: Container becomes sticky after scrolling past contopoffset (100px). Slide animation adds smooth transition effect.
warnings: Set high z-index (900+) to ensure sticky container appears above other content
Test on mobile - sticky containers can consume too much viewport height
Avoid nested sticky containers - can cause z-index conflicts
sanimaType requires stTransdur to be set for animation duration

validationRules.contSticky.md: Must be true to enable sticky behavior
validationRules.zIndex: Must be higher than other content (recommended 900-999)

examples.name: Animated Gradient Background (Pro)
examples.description: Full-width container with animated multi-color gradient that transitions smoothly
examples.visualDescription: Full viewport width, 500px minimum height, gradient animates between purple (#8072fc), green (#6fc784), and pink (#ff5a6e) colors. 5-second loop creates smooth color flow effect.
examples.useCase: Modern hero sections, creative portfolios, attention-grabbing headers
examples.performanceNotes: Animated gradients use CSS animations - minimal performance impact
examples.visualTips: Use 3-5 colors for best effect. Longer animdur (5-10s) creates subtle, elegant transitions. Shorter (<3s) creates energetic effect.
warnings: Animated backgrounds can distract from content - ensure sufficient contrast for text
Test color combinations for readability - may need text shadows or overlay
colorList requires minimum 2 colors, recommended 3-5 colors
animdur in seconds (recommended 3-10 for smooth effect)

examples.name: Parallax Image Background (Pro)
examples.description: Container with image background that moves at different speed than scroll (parallax effect)
examples.visualDescription: Full-width container, 600px minimum height, background image moves slower than scroll creating depth effect. Dark overlay (0.4 opacity) ensures content readability.
examples.useCase: Visual storytelling, feature sections, portfolio showcases
examples.responsiveNotes: Parallax disabled on mobile devices for performance and UX. Shows static background instead.
examples.performanceNotes: Use optimized images (WebP, compressed). Parallax can impact scroll performance on slower devices.
warnings: Parallax disabled on iOS/mobile devices - provide good static fallback
Use high-resolution images but optimize file size (<500KB recommended)
Set parallax: true to enable parallax scrolling effect
Always include overlay for text readability

validationRules.parallax: Set to true to enable parallax effect

examples.name: Multi-Shape Divider Section
examples.description: Container with shape dividers on top and bottom for creative section transitions
examples.visualDescription: Wide container, white background, purple wave shape at top (inverted), green triangle shape at bottom. 450px minimum height. Creates flowing visual transition between sections.
examples.useCase: Creative section breaks, modern page layouts, visual separation
examples.visualTips: Shape dividers create smooth visual flow between sections. Match shape colors to adjacent sections for seamless integration.
warnings: Shape colors should match adjacent section backgrounds for seamless effect
shapeTFlip/shapeBFlip inverts shape direction - use for variety
Test shape heights on mobile - may need to reduce for small screens
Available shapes: wave, triangle, curve, clouds, zigzag

examples.name: Centered Content with Border & Shadow
examples.description: Boxed container with border, shadow, and centered alignment for card-like appearance
examples.visualDescription: 1000px wide centered container, white background, 2px solid purple border, medium shadow for depth. Looks like floating card on page. 400px minimum height.
examples.useCase: Feature boxes, testimonial sections, highlighted content areas
examples.visualTips: Combining border, shadow, and border-radius creates professional card effect. Subtle shadow (blur: 24, low opacity) looks modern.

examples.name: Full-Height Viewport Section
examples.description: Container that fills 100% of viewport height for full-screen sections
examples.visualDescription: Full viewport width and height (100vh), gradient background, content vertically and horizontally centered. Creates immersive full-screen experience.
examples.useCase: Landing page sections, portfolio showcases, full-screen CTAs
examples.responsiveNotes: Uses 100vh on desktop for full viewport height. Switches to fixed 600px on mobile to avoid very tall sections on portrait orientation.
warnings: 100vh on mobile can be tricky due to browser chrome - test thoroughly
Consider reducing to fixed height (600-800px) on mobile
Avoid multiple 100vh sections - can disorient users
Test content overflow - ensure all content fits or is scrollable

validationRules.minHeight.md: Use 100 with unit 'vh' for full viewport

hero-section.description: Full-width hero with gradient, centered content, wave divider

gutterSpace.description: Becomes padding for child tp-container-inner blocks
gutterSpace.warning: Large gutter values (>50px) can cause layout issues

parallax.description: Enable parallax scrolling effect for background images

contSticky.description: Makes container stick to viewport when scrolling

warnings: **CRITICAL**: Never modify or regenerate block_id - causes blocks to break
Container is parent of tp-container-inner blocks - use proper nesting
gutterSpace applies as padding to child tp-container-inner blocks, not container itself
Full-width (contentWidth: 'full') ignores containerWide setting
Video backgrounds (deepBgopt: 'bg_video') require videoMute: true for autoplay
Shape dividers (shapeTop/shapeBottom) may need color adjustment to match adjacent sections
Sticky containers (contSticky) need high z-index (900+) to appear above content
Parallax effects (parallax: true) disabled on mobile devices
100vh height can be problematic on mobile due to browser chrome
openBg: 1 is required before setting any background properties
openBorder: 1 is required before setting border properties
openShadow: 1 is required before setting shadow properties

commonMistakes.fix: Always set openBg: 1 before bgType, bgDefaultColor, bgGradient, etc.

commonMistakes.mistake: Using wide containerWide value with contentWidth: 'full'
commonMistakes.fix: containerWide only applies when contentWidth is 'wide'

commonMistakes.mistake: Expecting gutterSpace to add container padding
commonMistakes.fix: gutterSpace creates padding on child tp-container-inner blocks, use Padding for container
Set zIndex to 900+ for sticky containers
commonMistakes.impact: Sticky container appears behind other content

commonMistakes.mistake: Using video background without poster image
commonMistakes.fix: Always provide videoImg for loading state
Limit to 1-2 full-height sections per page
Always set md, sm, xs values for heights, padding, widths

bestPractices: Use semantic HTML tags (section, header, footer, article) for tagName
Always provide responsive values (md, sm, xs) for spacing and dimensions
Use rem/em units for padding when possible (better for accessibility)
Combine multiple containers to create complex layouts
Use gutterSpace consistently across page for visual harmony (15px or 30px)
Test sticky containers on mobile - often better to disable
Use shape dividers sparingly - too many can be overwhelming
Match shape divider colors to adjacent sections for seamless flow

layoutContext.gutterBehavior: gutterSpace value becomes padding for all child tp-container-inner blocks
layoutContext.fullWidthBehavior: contentWidth: 'full' creates edge-to-edge layout, ignores containerWide
layoutContext.wideBehavior: contentWidth: 'wide' creates centered container with max-width from containerWide
layoutContext.stickyContext: Sticky containers create new stacking context, require z-index management
layoutContext.shapeContext: Shape dividers overflow container bounds to create seamless transitions

performanceConsiderations: Video backgrounds increase page load time - use compressed videos
Parallax effects can impact scroll performance on slower devices
Animated gradients (bg_animate_gradient/scroll_animate_color) are CSS-based, minimal impact
Large background images should be optimized (WebP, compressed)
Multiple sticky containers on same page can cause performance issues
Shape dividers are SVG-based, lightweight and performant
